last_episode_to_air.name: The End and the Beginning
last_episode_to_air.overview: Fee and Foo are reunited with their parents, and their lives and their friendship with Harvey changes forever.

name: Harvey Beaks
overview: A mild-mannered young bird and his best friends, a pair of rambunctious siblings called Fee and Foo, seek adventure and mischief in the magical forest that they call home.

episodes.name: Pe-Choo!
episodes.overview: To have an awesome time at the lake, Harvey has to do the one thing that's the hardest for him: get in really big trouble.

episodes.name: The Spitting Tree
episodes.overview: The kids spit from the highest tree in Littlebark until they realize they can't get back down.

episodes.name: The Finger
episodes.overview: The discovery of a giant, stone finger in the ground leads the kids on a passionate quest to find out what's attached to the rest of it.

episodes.name: The Negatives of Being Positively Charged
episodes.overview: When Fee and Foo become magnetized, nature seems determined to force them apart.

episodes.name: The Rentl Bike
episodes.overview: Harvey and Foo rent a bike from a grumpy shopkeeper and learn the meaning of the phrase "Buyer Beware."

episodes.name: Anti-Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: Always excluded from Valentine's Day festivities, Fee makes up her own holiday called Anti-Valentine's Day.

episodes.name: Nightclub Night
episodes.overview: It's all-ages night at the club and Harvey can't wait to blow everyone's minds with his rad dance moves.

episodes.name: The Rebel
episodes.overview: Harvey becomes convinced that he's a rebel… even though he has no idea what being a rebel means.

episodes.name: Harvey's First Scar
episodes.overview: Envious of Fee and Foo's cool scars, Harvey asks them to give him a scar of his own. He just doesn't realize that getting hurt is part of the process.

episodes.name: A Tail of Les Squirrels
episodes.overview: The kids find a detached tail in the woods and decide to keep it.

episodes.name: The Nature of Nature
episodes.overview: Harvey goes on a heroic crusade to stop the spread of chaos in the forest.

episodes.name: Princess Is Better Than You
episodes.overview: Tired of seeing Princess unfairly win at everything, Harvey and his friends try to teach her a lesson.

episodes.name: Old-Fashioned Dade
episodes.overview: Dade is thrilled to hang with Harvey at the yearly Old-Fashioned Days festival.

episodes.name: Someone's Stealing My Stuff
episodes.overview: Fee and Foo instantly get blamed when everyone's stuff goes missing. In order to protect his friends, Harvey searches to find the real culprit.

episodes.name: Comet Night? (1)
episodes.overview: Harvey tries to have a magical night of bonding with his father, but everything goes horribly, horribly wrong.

episodes.name: Comet Night! (2)
episodes.overview: Miriam tries to prove that she's still got excitement in her veins by taking Fee and the girls out for a wild night.

episodes.name: The Almighty Foo
episodes.overview: When Foo accidentally destroys a bug village, he tries to make it up by giving them a safe, new home: Harvey's house.

episodes.name: The Ghost Problem
episodes.overview: Fee's prejudices against ghosts gets her into a mess of trouble with the local ghost librarian.

episodes.name: The Sleepover's Over
episodes.overview: The twins invite Harvey over for a sleepover, but there's just one problem: Harvey has NEVER made it all the way through a sleepover before.

episodes.name: Certified Babysitter
episodes.overview: After earning a babysitting badge, Harvey is determined to prove he can babysit his little sister all on his own.

episodes.name: Fee's Haircut
episodes.overview: After Fee gets her first ever haircut, she has to decide what's better: looking awesome or being awesome.

episodes.name: Harvey's Favorite Book
episodes.overview: Harvey feels jealous when all the kids fall in love with his favorite detective book series.

episodes.name: Dad Band
episodes.overview: Harvey helps his father's garage band hit the big-time, but when the band's egos get out of control, it's up to Harvey to bring them back down to earth.

episodes.name: Foo's Panic Room
episodes.overview: Afraid that everyone wants to steal his favorite berries, Foo locks himself and the fruit away in a box.

episodes.name: A Day of No To-Do
episodes.overview: When Harvey goes overboard with his new day-planner, Fee tries to show him that the best-laid plans are sometimes the least-planned ones.

episodes.name: Recipe for Disaster
episodes.overview: Harvey enlists the help of the twins to cook a big, fancy dinner for his parents.

episodes.name: Randl's Scandl
episodes.overview: When Randl decides to cut ties with his mother, Fee and Foo have to make him see how perfect a mother she really is.

episodes.name: King of Pranks
episodes.overview: Harvey pulls off a prank on Littlebark Grove, but by not wanting to upset anyone with the truth, he has to keep it going.

episodes.name: Night Maid
episodes.overview: To save Littlebark from the rising tide of trash, Harvey becomes the superhero his town needs.

episodes.name: Icky Chicky
episodes.overview: Having outgrown his favorite baby toy, Harvey gives it to Foo, but letting go is harder than he thought.

episodes.name: Buds Before Studs
episodes.overview: When Princess claims Foo as her boyfriend, Fee and Claire team up to undo the disaster.

episodes.name: Le Corn Maze ... OF DOOM!
episodes.overview: After the kids claim that last year's Halloween festival maze wasn't at all scary, Les Squirrels make this year's maze the scariest ever.

episodes.name: Harvey Isn't Scary
episodes.overview: While the children follow a Halloween tradition of telling scary stories, Harvey can't seem to scare anyone with his stories.

episodes.name: Harvey Fights Kratz
episodes.overview: After Harvey and Kratz get into a minor disagreement, they're told the only way they can remain friends is to fight it out like dudes.

episodes.name: Yampions
episodes.overview: It's board game night at the Beaks' house. Harvey teams up with his father against his mother and the twins.

episodes.name: Barkball
episodes.overview: When a little league coach rejects Harvey and his friends, they're determined to prove him wrong in a winner-take-all game.

episodes.name: Junior Squealers
episodes.overview: Fee is the culprit of a crime-wave in Littlebark, and Harvey has to figure out if it's better to be true to the rules or to your friends.

episodes.name: The Storm
episodes.overview: Harvey is worried living outside is unsafe and insists the twins move in with him.

episodes.name: Steamgate
episodes.overview: Feeling like no one in town shares his interests, Moff builds a portal to another dimension.

episodes.name: Yeti Ready
episodes.overview: Afraid that he can't protect his family from an imaginary yeti, Irving goes to Rooter's survivalist family for help.

episodes.name: Terrybear
episodes.overview: Technobear is shocked to discover his real name is Terrybear. With no idea who he really is anymore, he decides to re-invent himself.

episodes.name: Bark Kart
episodes.overview: The kids of Littlebark enter an epic go-kart race.

episodes.name: Wade Is Cooler Than Dade
episodes.overview: Dade tries to change to be cool like his younger brother Wade.

episodes.name: King of the Castle
episodes.overview: The kids build an awesome castle out of garbage, but must keep Princess from knocking it down.

episodes.name: Foofee
episodes.overview: Fee and Foo have a secret language just for the two of them, but Foo feels betrayed when Fee shares it with Harvey.

episodes.name: Why Are You Even Friends?
episodes.overview: Dade loses it when he has doubts about whether or not he and Harvey are totally best friends.

episodes.name: Alone
episodes.overview: Unable to find anyone to play with for the day, Harvey has to find a way to have fun all by himself.

episodes.name: Foo Shoes
episodes.overview: Foo's handmade mud shoes become popular in Littlebark, until Les Squirrels steal his idea by making knock-offs.

episodes.name: The Punishment
episodes.overview: Wracked with guilt over accidentally breaking a plate, Harvey tries to find a big enough punishment.

episodes.name: Arbor Day
episodes.overview: Arbor Day, Piri Piri's favorite day, comes under attack from historical accuracy.

episodes.name: Double Digits
episodes.overview: Harvey believes that he'll become a boring adult when he turns 10, so he tries to cancel his birthday.

episodes.name: Fee and Foo's First Birthday
episodes.overview: The twins have never had a birthday, so they throw the biggest bash Littlebark has ever seen.

episodes.name: The New Bugaboo
episodes.overview: Thinking his family is big enough, Harvey gives his baby sister away.

episodes.name: The Case of the Missing Pancake
episodes.overview: Harvey's grandparents are the suspects of a despicable crime: pancake theft.

episodes.name: Kathy with a K
episodes.overview: Harvey meets Kathy, a shy girl who LOVES leaves, and tries to find her some like-minded friends, but his efforts misfire.

episodes.name: Harvey's Pet
episodes.overview: Wanting to show he's responsible enough to have a pet, Harvey adopts a plant and treats it like a puppy.

episodes.name: Life Debt
episodes.overview: Wanting to show he's responsible enough to have a pet, Harvey adopts a plant and treats it like a puppy.

episodes.name: The Feelings
episodes.overview: Irving sets up a demonstrative camping trip in hopes of connecting with his stone-faced father.

episodes.name: Bag of Naughty
episodes.overview: When Harvey, Fee and Foo find a bag of magical fireworks, Jeremy warns them to get rid of it fast, but it's a challenge because it gives temptation to play with the fireworks.

episodes.name: Steampunks (1)
episodes.overview: Harvey imagines himself and his friends in a magical steampunk world, but things come crashing down when Harvey is blamed for breaking a floating city

episodes.name: Steampunks (2)
episodes.overview: Harvey imagines himself and his friends in a magical steampunk world, but things come crashing down when Harvey is blamed for breaking a floating city

episodes.name: Mr. and Mrs. Borks
episodes.overview: When Harvey's parents decide to get remarried, Fee and Harvey plan crazy bachelor and bachelorette parties before the big day.

episodes.name: Operation Peanut Butter
episodes.overview: Harvey leads the squirrels on a daring heist in order to help them regain their confidence as outlaws.

episodes.name: Little Littlebark
episodes.overview: Harvey makes doll replicas of the citizens of Littlebark and believes they have magical powers.

episodes.name: Repo Fee
episodes.overview: Randl takes Fee under his wing and teaches her the family business.

episodes.name: Stalemates
episodes.overview: Fee and Foo try to prove they are the strongest folks in Littlebark by entering an arm-wrestling competition.

episodes.name: Technoscare
episodes.overview: When Technobear decides he's too cool for trick-or-treating, he's visited by three Halloween spirits that remind him of the true meaning of the holiday.

episodes.name: It's Christmas, You Dorks!
episodes.overview: Old Man Winter makes a musical wonderland out of Littlebark Grove.

episodes.name: Rockbark Rocks
episodes.overview: Harvey thinks he is ready to rock out at his first concert, but is he really ready?

episodes.name: Ocean Promotion
episodes.overview: When the Lake Spirit gets a promotion, Harvey tries to convince him that Littlebark is too great of a town to leave.

episodes.name: Jeremy: Defender of the Forest
episodes.overview: An unspeakable evil from Jeremy's heroic past resurfaces, causing him to become a warrior once more.

episodes.name: Princess Harvey
episodes.overview: When Princess becomes Harvey for the day, she fights tooth and nail to keep his loving family all to herself.

episodes.name: The Split
episodes.overview: When Dade and the twins have an epic fight, Harvey is torn between the 2 warring sides.

episodes.name: The Dade
episodes.overview: Dade gets a sandwich named after him and finally feels special.

episodes.name: Secret Gordon
episodes.overview: Harvey and Piri Piri find a secret garden, but Piri Piri wants to keep it a secret.

episodes.name: The Unknown Comic
episodes.overview: A comic comes to Littlebark by an unknown artist. Who made it?

episodes.name: The Blister
episodes.overview: When Fee and Foo are forced to volunteer at a retirement home, Fee bonds with an old guy named Blister with an interesting life before he was put in the retirement home.

episodes.name: The Bad Seed
episodes.overview: After Michelle is not allowed to watch a scary movie, she still wants to watch it by any means necessary.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Muesli and Jangles
episodes.overview: When Harvey and the twins are sick, Irving tells them how he met Miriam with some creative and weird improvements.

episodes.name: Floo-id
episodes.overview: After an incident, Foo becomes a stretchy guy!

episodes.name: Hug Life
episodes.overview: In order to be part of Blister's Greasers gang, Harvey tries to prove himself worthy – his way.

episodes.name: On the Fence
episodes.overview: Upon finding a fence, Harvey devises it as a way to unite his community. However, it ends up doing the opposite.

episodes.name: The Late Late Afternoon Show with Harvey Beaks
episodes.overview: Harvey hosts a talk show in his living room but goes off-script when learning a terrible truth.

episodes.name: The Grunicorn
episodes.overview: The kids are on a race to find a rare magical creature and the winner is granted their heart's desire.

episodes.name: Photo Finished
episodes.overview: Miriam gets into a social media war to prove Harvey and Michelle are the cutest kids in Littlebark.

episodes.name: Squashbuckling
episodes.overview: Randl wants an old boat for scrap, but it's infested with children pretending they're pirates.

episodes.name: Later, Dingus
episodes.overview: Miriam gets a call from the nursing home Blister is from to tell Fee he died. At first, she thinks it's a joke, but when he doesn't show up on the prank, she learns it the hard way.

episodes.name: Hair to Help
episodes.overview: Tara has lost her creative inspiration for hairstyling, so Piri Piri and Harvey help her to rediscover her passion.

episodes.name: Break the Lake
episodes.overview: There's a new lake spirit in town who tries her best, but she's a hot mess.

episodes.name: The Amazing Harvey
episodes.overview: Harvey becomes a magician, but keeping the secrets behind the magic turns into a great burden.

episodes.name: Princess Wants a Mom
episodes.overview: Princess orders her dad to start dating again so she can have a new mom.

episodes.name: Rage Against the Michelle
episodes.overview: Michelle wrecks Harvey's stuff, so Harvey must cope with an unfamiliar emotion.

episodes.name: Grand Motel
episodes.overview: When Harvey and his family check in to a motel, he gains a new life's purpose, going down the pool's water slide.

episodes.name: Missing Harvey
episodes.overview: Harvey's away for one day and his friends can't cope with his absence.

episodes.name: Leaf It to Kathy
episodes.overview: Kathy hosts an online advice show and helps Kratz find his love.

episodes.name: A Child's Guide to Surviving in the Wild
episodes.overview: The boys get lost in the woods and learn how to survive, Rooter-style.

episodes.name: The End and the Beginning
episodes.overview: Fee and Foo are reunited with their parents, and their lives and their friendship with Harvey changes forever.
